Name: Evrisia Art
About the game: Evrisia Art is a VR based painting program intended to help introduce new users to VR and to feel comfortable using the Steam VR VIVE controllers and system. PC / VIVE only, it allows the person in VR to paint shapes all around them, but also allows the computer operator to guide them while inside the experience, as well as changing settings to make it simpler or easier to use depending on their skillset. Available to anyone who meets the requirements of the HTC Vive System. Evrisia Art is integrated into the Evrisia Eye testing system.
